info.title: sevDesk Contact API
info.description:
# General information Welcome to our Contact API!
You can use it to manage contacts in your sevDesk account. # Cross-Origin Resource Sharing This API features Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).
It enables cross-domain communication from the browser.
All responses have a wildcard same-origin which makes them completely public and accessible to everyone, including any code on any site. # Embedding resources When retrieving resources by using this API, you might encounter nested resources in the resources you requested.
For example, an invoice always contains a contact, of which you can see the ID and the object name.
This API gives you the possibility to embed these resources completely into the resources you originally requested.
Taking our invoice example, this would mean, that you would not only see the ID and object name of a contact, but rather the complete contact resource. To embed resources, all you need to do is to add the query parameter 'embed' to your GET request.
As values, you can provide the name of the nested resource.
Multiple nested resources are also possible by providing multiple names, separated by a comma.

servers.description: Our main application instance which most of our customers work with
Our swiss application instance, hosted and maintained by smart seven AG

get.description: Retrieves the next available customer number. Avoids duplicates.

get.summary: Check if a customer number is available
get.description: Checks if a given customer number is available or already used.

parameters.name: customerNumber
parameters.description: The customer number to be checked.

200.description: Returns whether given customer number is available.

get.description:
There are a multitude of parameter which can be used to filter.
A few of them are attached but for a complete list please check out this list

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
Defines if both organizations and persons should be returned.
'0' -> only organizations, '1' -> organizations and persons

parameters.name: customerNumber
parameters.description: Retrieve all contacts with this customer number

update.description: Date of last contact update

name.description:
The organization name.
Be aware that the type of contact will depend on this attribute.
If it holds a value, the contact will be regarded as an organization.

parent.description: The parent contact to which this contact belongs. Must be an organization.

id.description: Unique identifier of the parent contact

surename.description:
The first name of the contact.
Yeah... not quite right in literally every way. We know.
Not to be used for organizations.

familyname.description:
The last name of the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

titel.description:
A non-academic title for the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

category.description:
Category of the contact.
For more information, see here.

description.example: Rightful king of the seven kingdoms

academicTitle.description:
A academic title for the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

gender.description:
Gender of the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

sevClient.description: Client to which contact belongs. Will be filled automatically

name2.description:
Second name of the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

birthday.description:
Birthday of the contact.
Not to be used for organizations.

bankAccount.description: Bank account number (IBAN) of the contact.

bankNumber.description: Bank number of the bank used by the contact.

defaultCashbackTime.description: Absolute time in days which the contact has to pay his invoices and subsequently get a cashback.

defaultCashbackPercent.description: Percentage of the invoice sum the contact gets back if he payed invoices in time.

defaultTimeToPay.description: The payment goal in days which is set for every invoice of the contact.

taxNumber.description: The tax number of the contact.

taxOffice.description: The tax office responsible for the contact.

exemptVat.description: Defines if the contact is freed from paying vat.

taxType.description: Defines which tax regulation the contact is using.

taxSet.description: Tax set which is used in every invoice of the contact.

id.description: Unique identifier of the tax set

defaultDiscountAmount.description:
The default discount the contact gets for every invoice.
Depending on defaultDiscountPercentage attribute, in percent or absolute value.

defaultDiscountPercentage.description: Defines if the discount is a percentage (true) or an absolute value (false).

post.description:
Creates a new contact.
For adding addresses and communication ways, you will need to use the ContactAddress and CommunicationWay endpoints.

get.description: Returns all communication ways of a given contact.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of contact for which you want the communication ways

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

value.description:
The value of the communication way.
For example the phone number, e-mail address or website.

key.description:
The key of the communication way.
Similar to the category of addresses.
For all communication way keys please send a GET to /CommunicationWayKey.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

400.description: Bad request. Contact was not found

post.description: Adds a phone number to a contact.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of contact to which phone number is added

key.description: ID of communication way key for the phone number which is added.

main.description: Defines if the phone number is the main number of the contact.

200.description: Successful operation - Returns created communication way

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

value.description:
The value of the communication way.
For example the phone number, e-mail address or website.

key.description:
The key of the communication way.
Similar to the category of addresses.
For all communication way keys please send a GET to /CommunicationWayKey.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

post.description: Adds an email to a contact.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of contact to which email is added

key.description: ID of communication way key for the email which is added.

main.description: Defines if the email is the main email of the contact.

200.description: Successful operation - Returns created communication way

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

value.description:
The value of the communication way.
For example the phone number, e-mail address or website.

key.description:

Similar to the category of addresses.
For all communication way keys please send a GET to /CommunicationWayKey.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

post.description: Adds an address to a contact.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of contact to which address is added

country.description: ID of the country of the address

category.description: ID of the category of the address

200.description: Successful operation - Returns created contact address

update.description: Date of last contact address update

contact.description: The contact to which this contact address belongs.

country.description:
Country of the contact address.
For all countries, send a GET to /StaticCountry

category.description:
Category of the contact address.
For all categories, send a GET to /Category?objectType=ContactAddress.

sevClient.description: Client to which contact address belongs. Will be filled automatically

update.description: Date of last contact address update

contact.description: The contact to which this contact address belongs.

country.description:
Country of the contact address.
For all countries, send a GET to /StaticCountry

get.description: Returns all communication ways which have been added up until now. Filters can be added.

parameters.name: contact[id]
parameters.description: ID of contact for which you want the communication ways.

parameters.name: contact[objectName]
parameters.description: Object name. Only needed if you also defined the ID of a contact.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the communication ways you want to get.

parameters.name: main
parameters.description: Define if you only want the main communication way.

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

value.description:
The value of the communication way.
For example the phone number, e-mail address or website.

key.description:
The key of the communication way.
Similar to the category of addresses.
For all communication way keys please send a GET to /CommunicationWayKey.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

post.summary: Create a new contact communication way
post.description: Creates a new contact communication way.

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

value.description:
The value of the communication way.
For example the phone number, e-mail address or website.

key.description:
The key of the communication way.
Similar to the category of addresses.
For all communication way keys please send a GET to /CommunicationWayKey.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

201.description: Created - Returns created contact communication way

update.description: Date of last communication way update

contact.description: The contact to which this communication way belongs.

main.description: Defines whether the communication way is the main communication way for the contact.

sevClient.description: Client to which communication way key belongs. Will be filled automatically

parameters.description: Id of communication way resource to delete
